title: GUI overlay is not shown unless you point at the widget with mouse

content.raw:
GUI overlay is not shown unless you point at the place with mouse.
I compiled the example plugin *libgui_example_spawn_widget.so*.
I run Ubuntu Linux 14.04.1 in Parallels 9. (
Linux ubuntu 3.13.0-45-generic #74-Ubuntu SMP Tue Jan 13 19:36:28 UTC 2015 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux)

I attached video that demonstrates the bug.
Here is dropbox linux https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/17359569/gui_overlay_bug.mp4, 
just in case if you cannot access the video file in the attachment.
